data.text: I never realized how many coupons I was missing out on until I downloaded this. It's not perfect, some functions don't work, and if the advertised product in the store has a different barcode the coupon won't work, and you can usually save even more money by just buying generic brand stuff, and prices usually are raised during an active digital coupon so that $1 saved is more like 20Â¢ saved, but I still like it.

Easy & saves a lot. My only issue is sometimes items won't ring up the same price as on the app. & employees won't always change it to match. Also, different prices & deals for each store. Even in the same town. So you have to change the app store location to know what deals you get. When everything is what it says, runs smoothly, then it's a great way to save.

It is a difficult app to use. It can't switch from in-store shopping without having to go through a couple of steps. it's hard to shop at home to make a list because my store doesn't allow pick up, so it shows the stuff is added to my list but all the totals are zero so I can't get a total. I go to check out it doesn't always load the coupons in the register when I put my phone number

Fix your app! It's always messed up. Gives error message when scanning items -if u can even get that far and since update its a pain to get to my list - which I also had to erase and restart due to glitches. Always freezes up or after scanning a few things will no longer scan and just go back to main screen or will say everything is 0.00 til you close then reopen app then it works for about 2 minutes and starts messing up again.

Sad to say, it's the only app for DG. The app shows wrong prices, not all items listed, either with price, or even a picture, or not even listed at all. The cart calculator is NOTHING but a hot mess for employees! This causes issues in stores. Coupons don't always work, or are not even available for use when they should be. The app needs to be updated with a major overhaul to make it actually work correctly. In short, this app is a joke to Dollar General.

Good Idea, Failed Execution The ability to search for and add coupons and cash back to an app / program tied to your phone number is easy, convenient, and nowadays fairly standard. DG makes it easy to do that in their app. What it *cannot* do, apparently, is actually retrieve that information and honor the coupons and cash back at the store. The manager and I even went through every item that was supposed to be discounted, and she agreed that they were all legit. It just doesn't work.

I absolutely love saving money! I would've rated this app at 5 stars however, there have been several times I've saved a coupon but it doesn't get deducted from my purchase. This has been an issue since I downloaded the app. most stores will give me the money back, but it's an inconvenience to those in line behind me and also defeats the purpose of taking the time to clip the coupons.

The Digital Coupons are great! I am able to afford some brands like Tide, I would normally not pay for at full price. No guilt with the digital coupons! The variety of items included in these are vast. This digital program/app truly benefits my wallet. I can choose what I prefer & afford it. The only problem I see is Laurel Lake location has stocking carts EVERYWHERE in the store. I have to use multiple aisles to get to my needed item. Navigation is tricky & store not ever stocked properly.

I use this app everyday to coupon. It is absolutely horrible the way it makes me filter and sort every time I return to the deals page from selecting an item to go with my coupon. Crashes in store while trying to scan even though I am on the customer wifi. Why there is a list and a cart is beyond me. Item should be put on list then added to the cart from there. You would think at the rate they build stores they could build a better app by now.

I think the prices could be more manageable with a $5.00 coupon to be used any day of the week. Also, offer a coupon where you buy less for the digital coupon (such as candy items, (etc.). I would like to mention you owe me a few dollars for digital coupons not redeemed properly. I thought I tried to check out the sales item separately; but it might have been with the $5.00 digital coupon used; and then it didn't work.

The app is pretty good. I like the fact that when I clip a coupon it just lets me clip it w/o having to open the coupon like other apps do. I'd like to suggest that they clean up the search engine. When I search for a product or a general product I know they have in store I always get a "product not found" message. It's like it doesn't recognize a key word searches sometimes. I love the scanner and use it all the time. But I often get a message saying the product isn't found. Love it thou!!

I mean, it's okay, I guess. The search feature definitely needs some tweaks. When I type in a specific term or product, it should only display those products. Why would there be toothpaste (at the top no less) when I search for an extension cord? If the inventory count is accurate, it can help you see if your local store has an itm in stock. It's okay, but it could definitely be better.

So far this app is working great as it is described to do!! As well as the savings from the coupons you just add to app instead of having to cut all the ones you want out and put them somewhere you will remember so you don't forget to actually use them when you go shopping as well as having to remember what all the products are that you have coupon for!! I am a frazzle brain as my husband likes to say so it is very convenient and easy for me to have and use!!!! Thanks for that!!

in a time of high inflation and a lower wages saving money has never been more important. This app helps you to save even more from Dollar general already low prices. the app is very simple and easy to navigate. just tap on the coupon and it's automatically saved in your electronic, and once you get to the register just enter your phone number and watch the savings pile-up. by-the-way Dollar general did not pay me to write this awesome review. lol.... maybe they should!

Love the coupons and cash back! Fantastic app full of awesome deals. The ONLY ISSUE is that often, the inventory does not match what is in store, particularly for items that are marked as "in store only, not online. They usually show as out of stock in store, even when the store actually isn't out of stock. I've seen this issue with a lot of items! Either way, Dollar General is a terrific store with really fair and competitive prices on foods and household items (detergent, dish soap, etc!)

The app started out okay but gradually gets worse. It always gives a error message, doesn't always save the coupons you clip in app and often have to clip a coupon several times before it saves it, when you get to register it doesn't always add the coupons you've clipped in app or add the savings. Product inventory is often misleading, says something is in stocks but isn't and vise versa. Honestly so inconsistent now that it's not worth the time to check out or clip before visit.

Unnecessarily difficult. Trying to use the app is a pain. Usually I need to connect to it in the store to see the deals I might want but then in the majority of stores can't even get good data connection. You also have to be able to select the items you want to save on and then do something else. I can't even remember. Then if you do everything right you have to punch in your phone number at the register. Unnecessarily Difficult. It should be more like a 7 eleven card or food lion MVP card.

Awful, I have been using this off and on for more than a year. They must pay the developers a bonus for making each version less user-friendly. Logs me out and then wants to verify me. Then it doesn't send the verification text. When you are lucky enough to get in, it often loads very slowly or not at all. Forget trying to use it in the store. Navigation is cumbersome. DG needs to throw this app in the trash heap and start over.

Like many store apps, this one requires too much personal information. Your name and phone no. and you must agree to receive calls and text message, then your location data so it can find a store near you. Of course these seem harmless, but it's a lot of personal data to provide for little benefit. While you can skip some, I'm stuck manually entering a zip code with no stores found and then 'please turn on location services'again. Avoid this one unless DG is the only store near you.

Fix the Earned Cash Back I have purchased enough "cash back products" to have "$10.75" sitting there that I can't use at MULTIPLE LOCATIONS so it isn't just one store! Why even have a feature like that and have it broken? The app crashes and is laggy AF. It's not very intuitive. I do however like the coupons and like the incentives to get things I normally buy at a cheaper price. So taking two stars for broken feature (Earned Cash wallet = Broken) and the poor interface. Will update later.

App has gotten a lot better other than the search engine. And I have earned cash back from the coupons. Every time I've tried to use it at checkout, the cashier scans the barcode & it does not work. That's the reason for 3 â It's not the cashier because they've tried several times on several different occasions. The system won't work. Please fix this!

This app truly is trash. I just updated it. It's nearly impossible to navigate without it freezing. I'm trying to change my store location. It wont allow me to select a store. Who made this thing?? It's entirely useless. You all need a new app developer person. The one in charge is clearly on a brain vacation.

This app is by far the absolute worst. I'm never able to log in, and when I do, it's always crashing. If I could give it -0 stars, I would. If the app works correctly, it's good, but the problem is that it's never working. I HATE THIS APP. I always have to uninstall and reinstall the app and it still doesn't work. It won't even open now.

Worst app for several years. Constant errors, Everytime you open the app even if it's 5 minutes after you just opened it wants to verify through email then never sends a code. It's the same phone I have had for 2 years and same phone number for 10. This isn't a bank. I delete it then a few months later download it again and it's never any better. Get frustrated then delete again. Ugh.

I'm not sure why I need to physically clip 112 coupons in order to get the deals. Its cumbersome and once I hit clip, the app just spins and spins. I like the app so I can look at what's there and what sales arehappening. Also the service in our store sucks so I can't even load the app while inside dollar general.

CAN'T LOGIN! I went to the store wanted to load the digital coupons couldn't log in it had a problem with password and or my email account I tried the email I tried the phone number I tried every password I can think of various combinations of both I even ultimately deleted the it and the data uninstalled, reinstalled and, when I type in my phone number to set up another account it keeps telling me the number already exists! Useless!

My phone number is already in use by whoever had it before me, and there is absolutely no way to deal with it. No CS contact at all, live chat is always down within its hours of 7AM-9PM est, no email, no phone number, the link to a form for this issue on the help center page has been dead for at least a year. I guess I'm just not allowed to use coupons. --edit Apparently there is an email linked here on the play store as a developer contact. Giving that a shot.

I do love this app and Dollar General digital coupons. It's a easy to use and understand app too. It helps out using the digital coupons and watching for sale items it makes prices more reasonable. Groceries are high these days and most of us need all the help we can get. The digital coupons are worth the effort and will help out your budget.

Too many notifications. App notifications duplicate the DG emails. Navigation within the app is a 0 out of 10. Filters do not work correctly. Clicking on an item in a DG email takes you to the home page in the app or the weekly flyer. What's the point of that? Why not have the item take you directly to that item in the app?

When you clip coupons and some of those coupons are for similar products, it always chooses the worst savings making you pay more. For example, $2 off making 12 packs 3 for $15, but on a Saturday if you have that coupon clipped and you want to pick up 6 12packs, it'll use the $2 off making you pay $29.80 instead of using the $5 off $25 making it $26.00. Dollar General ripping people off.

Junk app. Store is a dead zone, Wifi and mobile data won't work. App logs me out and makes me check my email to log back in. By the time I get back to the app the login is expired. Rinse and repeat. No important data is store locally so I need to be connected to do anything. The employees have no idea how to put in a ticket to correct their wifi issues. Thanks for the new features, too bad no one in Coon Rapids MN can use them. I'm heading over to Family Dollar or Big Lots. Their apps work.

I save all deals, coupons & cash back offers, in app. Then enter my phone number at the register and it applies the discounts & it keeps cash back in my account so I can use it whenever I want. I just wish the option to enter phone number at the registers and self checkout, stayed until you decline it or until phone number is entered, OR Cashier could ask if you use app, instead of just asking for payment.

There are a lot of helpful tools not many know about. If you're in store and you use the barcode scanner it will show you coupons to clip right there or deals from the Weekly Ad s you knowhow to get the best value. Sometimes you can find clearance items 50% off their markdown price, and after-sales for seasonal items can be up to 75% off, and sometimes even when they only say 25%-50%, so I always use the price checkered have fun with sales!

Most of the time, offers and coupons don't work, but bought gift cards to get $5 off next purchase and coupon is in wallet, but been to DG twice and it will not come off. Only need a purchase of $5.01, and I've made 2 purchases for over $25. Guess what? NO $5 off. My last straw: I tried using the $5 off $25 for Saturday, and it would not come off, no matter how much I added to my cart. I have officially quit using the app and shopping here. It's not worth my time, effort, and endless agony.

I have selected the stay signed in box and EVERY TIME I open the app or come back to it after a few minutes it tells me this is a new device and you need to verify this account with an email that sometimes never makes it to my inbox. This is especially frustrating when I am shopping in a store that doesn't have good Internet connection because of the building's structure ð¤¬

Extremely misleading coupons (fine print text doesn't specify Saturday only but the 16x16 ico image does), constant app breaking updates, and the phone number at check out only works some of the time. Very unreliable app that if you don't have service in the store to update every single time you go in, it's just a hassle. Very frustrating and embarrassing to use app. Uninstalled.

Wanted to use the app to prepare shopping lists and have access to coupons, but the demand for use of my location threw me off. I said no and was forced into a page that requires me to find a store. When I entered my city/zip, it just loads forever. Deleted it after 15 minutes of backing out and restarting, just to be met with the eternal loading screen again. Apps, search engines, and websites have all gone downhill. Pay your developers more and do better. This is sad.

It won't let me click coupons even after the update, it took 30 minutes just to send the verification code to my email even though I was connected to Wi-Fi and I have full bars. I hate when companies want us to rely on technology that doesn't work. Spend an hour in the parking lot dealing with this and ended up paying full price because this app is garbage.

Customer service is the WORST!! Items ring up for a different price than on the shelf! Scanner doesn't always work. Employees come up with they own stipulations on prices, app and products!! Dollar General sends you discounts/coupons that never get saved to your account and never compensate you for the loss!! You can't never purchase items that's supposed to be in store because it's still in the box sitting on a cart in the aisle! The worst company ever!

I honestly spent over an hour trying to set up a password so that I could order and pick up from DG. I followed all of the instructions and finally gave up. I'm disabled and to pick things would have been great. However, I needed a password for and account, but because of this ridiculous password issue, I will go elsewhere. In order to set up the DG account I honestly will not put anymore time in this. This process has been made too difficult to complete. Thanks to this mess, DG has lost a custo

I loved this app, it was always so easy to see the weekly sales ad and coupons were a breeze to clip. Now everytime I try to access the coupons it gives me an "error, try again later" message that has been showing up for the last 3 weeks. Most of the items I regularly buy have coupons that I can't access, so I have to shop elsewhere. Fix it, you're losing business!

I see I'm not the only one having the same issue. I go to login, and it does nothing. I clicked on 'forgot password', (trying to just mess with it) I type in my email address, and it says my email is invalid and I know it isn't. Hope you guys get the issue fixed. Love getting to use the coupons!! I never had any issues since you guys did an update.
data.replyText: Thanks so much for letting us know, Brianna. We're so sorry you're unable to sign-in and we understand this is frustrating! Please reach out to us at DGDCP@dollargeneral.com or 888-518-3446 so we can help get this resolved for you.

data.text: When I first installed the app, it worked fine for the set up and couple minutes I was using it to clip some digital coupins. Then when I left the app, and came back to it, it would not load anything. I tried reinstalling, disconnecting from the wifi, restarting my phone, checking for updates, even trying it on my boyfriend's iPhone and still all the same issues.
data.replyText: Hello Melissa. Please contact us at DGDCP@dollargeneral.com or at 888-518-3446. We'll work to get this fixed for you as quickly as possible. Thank you, so much, for your patience. -Autumn

data.text: I figured it out. To get the app to work past the agreement step. I first had to sign-in at the DG website. It will show the privacy terms agreement, this time there is a confirm button. Click on it (if you agree to the terms), your in, exit out. After doing that, the DG app works fine, and was able to use it. However, the digital coupon system is a complicated process, and why 3â. Needs to be simplified.
data.replyText: We're so sorry to hear this, Anthony. The best way to help troubleshoot your issue is by contacting us at DGDCP@dollargeneral.com or at 888-518-3446. We'll work to get this fixed for you as quickly as possible. Thank you, so much, for your patience. -Autumn

data.text: This app will NOT work. Everytime I try to "search" for an item or click on "deals" or "cart" ..pretty much ANYTHING I click on.. it ALWAYS displays an "Error processing your request. Please try again later." message. I have uninstalled and reinstalled several times over the past few months and it just continuously does the same thing. Pretty bummed out about it and really wish they'd fix it as it has the potential to be very useful.

I have tried several times to download the Dollar General app. I was finally successful after about a month. I used to only shop at another corporate store, but fell in love with DG when I saw that Dollar General had a $1 aisle! So, to my disappointment, I have tried unsuccessfully, yet again to get the app installed on my phone. It tells me that it is installed and I need to open it in the Play Store and I do so and nothing happens it says error. REPEATEDLY. Last night it allowed me to clip coupons, and I did, and when you are on a tight budget I needed those coupons badly! It is with sadness that I am going to have to go back to the "big box" chain store. Especially now when I was looking SO FORWARD to go shopping at DG today. 1ðâ¹
data.replyText: That's not what we like to hear, Emily. The best way for us to get you started is by contacting us at DGDCP@dollargeneral.com or at 888-518-3446. We'll work to get this fixed for you as quickly as possible. Thank you, so much, for your patience. -Autumn

data.text: The scanner and cart calculator will not work. Each time I try to create an account, there is an error. I've installed and uninstalled this App several times over the last week in order to try to reset it. I have changed settings on my phone to allow pop-ups; I noticed in someone else's review that doing that helped his App work better. It didn't work. The version of the App available as of the day of this review, is one of the worst, glitchy apps that I've ever downloaded. Highly disappointed.
data.replyText: Hello BG - We're so sorry, we know this is extremely frustrating. The best way to help troubleshoot your issue is by contacting us at DGDCP@dollargeneral.com or at 888-518-3446. We'll work to get this fixed for you as quickly as possible. Thank you, so much, for your patience. -Autumn

data.text: Not totally bad, but not totally great either. I mostly shop at DG for the coupons and its convenience. Item accuracy could be a bit more helpful since some products that were labeled "out of stock" on the app I ended up finding more of it at my local store. Considering the systems and technologies used in product counts, it's pretty understandable, but to some it may not be.

Mostly, I love this app and all it has to offer! Unfortunately, my store doesn't get cell service, or WIFI, so it's impossible to use once I'm there. Many of the services are obsolete to me because of this problem. It also seems when I first started using the app there were many more store coupons as opposed to manufacturers coupons. I'd love to see the next weeks ad available in the app also! I believe it use to show both towards the end of the week.

I'm having most of the same issues as everyone else. Signal & Wi-Fi doesn't work in the stores, constantly being told there is an error, It also has an error msg  saying that y'all are having issues and says change password. (Running out of ideas w/ them). Also everything in the app will work fine but not load my digital. I get an error msg. I've lost $ b/c of it too. It won't take my digital coupons off if this is happening. I've even stayed logged in, everything up and running then go to the store & check out only to see the error msg pop up. I'm not sure about upgrading. Really don't want more issues.

The app is great for quickly locating deals and coupons. It would be even better if it could be used offline. I love the scanning feature that checks prices as it helps me keep track of my total. The downfall however, I cannot always use the app in store to check deals, price scan or clip coupons because our store doesn't get great Internet reception. Without the connection, the app is useless in store.

Allows clipping digital coupons in advance, or scan in store to find them. But scanning is EXTREMELY SLOW and problematic, unlike the DG GO! app. Be sure to enter your phone # at checkout, or you used the app for nothing. Weekly ads are easier to view in app. Allows e-mailing/texting the receipt, so even if they don't give it, you still have it. But, coupons are almost all worthless, requiring multiple items, or bigger package than available. The app can handle logins, but their website can't.
data.replyText: Hello Greg. Thank you so much for your feedback! We really appreciate your input - we love hearing from our customers because it helps us improve your shopping experience. We will send your idea to the team and if we're not already working on it, we'll see if we can get it started! -Autumn

data.text: The app itself is a great idea. However, I find there are alot of instances where my digital coupons do not come off and the response from the store employees is ALWAYS there is nothing they can do if the app works good if not oh well. Along with the fact to use the scanner you need wifi and Bluetooth and turn on location but you can't get cell service in the back of most of the stores. Been using the app for over a year and it happens all the time. Thankful for the 5 off 25 on Saturdays.

for a month, every time I try to use the app, it keeps saying "unfortunately dollar general has stopped ok or report" I keep reporting it but haven't heard from anyone. it says that it was updated on 12/21/18!!! YEAH!!! RIGHT!!! my coupons works when I go the store but I'm really getting tired of having to go on the website, log in, and clip the coupons. hate to delete the app; but if I can't use it, then I don't need it taking up space on my phone.

This app gets worse with every update. There's coupons that are in store that don't show up on here, it's consistently kicking people off and having them log back in even after clicking the button to remember the information, the barcodes don't scan, and you can't get the deals that are advertised. I had to uninstall then reinstall because it was messing up and now I can't even access my account. There's so much push for people to download the app, but what's the point if it doesn't even work??

The app has the potential to be great. I'm not a huge fan of the changes and moving the coupons/shopping list etc. but I can adapt. The problem is, the app constantly gets overloaded and goes down. It's not a signal issue, it's most definitely an app issue. I can build a shopping list and a few minutes later it's empty. Wait an hour and everything is back. Coupons don't load, then they do, then you can't see them, then you can. Constant "something went wrong" errors. App needs stability.

Right now I am giving 4 stars, but would give the app 5 stars quickly if one thing was changed. I don't get SNAP Benefits myself, but as someone who has in the past, being able to order and pay online with Debit/Credit/Snap makes things a lot easier on people at home. Especially, if they barely have/have no transportation period. Otherwise, I absolutely love how easy it is to scan the items to not only get the price(s), but also get any coupon(s)/savings on the product as well at the same time.

I was a retail manager once. They had the best in store software at the time. In my opinion, for customer use, this is the best of all store apps out there. Easy to use, never crashes and more. The only thing I'd change, is the list page. I'd make it similar to the order pages. So the coupons, available, etc can be seen. Other companies should buy their software from Dollar General.

While I like and enjoy this app for the most part. I do however find it annoying when I am in some stores and can't get signal due to the roof of the building. I wish if the app is going to be available, that Dollar General at least would have open wi-fi so that customers could access the app while in-store. Because, there is nothing more annoying then can pull up digital coupons or can't check the price of an item due to no signal. That is my only complaint about the app. Love it otherwise!

Today, I installed the DG App at home -good interface. Saved my digital coupons. Went to the store. I had a list for $5 off $25. And I was excited to use the scanner to see if any other items had associated digital coupons. The App wouldn't load. Error msg. "No Internet connection. Make sure that Wi-Fi or data is turned on." Other websites were fine. When I got home I opened the app with wifi turned on. It worked. Turned off my phone Wi-Fi. App failed to open.
data.replyText: We're so sorry, we know this is extremely frustrating. The best way to help troubleshoot your issue is by contacting us at DGDCP@dollargeneral.com or at 888-518-3446. We'll work to get this fixed for you as quickly as possible. Thank you, so much, for your patience. -Autumn

data.text: Works fairly well. Makes you sign in with a password every time you use it with no shortcut, never "remembers" me on this device (even when I touch the box.) Locks you out after 3 tries. You have to contact customer service to unlock... way too much effort. Just setup an email password reset. Adding coupons to wallet then checking out always is smooth process. good job ð

Feature wise, it's decent. I REALLY appreciate the product stock information, since things are very often out of stock at DGs. (If only it had the same thing for avoiding under-staffed stores!) --This app can be super annoying though! Basic functions sometimes fail. It also has SO MANY annoying pop-ups! Repeated nags about completing my profile(why?!), enabling location, plus useless "how-to" screens. If a UI is well designed, no need to hand-hold users through exactly how to use every screen.

This app is not well designed. After logging in, you are directed to a Policy and T&C page to read and agree to, so that you can move forward. However the box that you click to agree to T&C is a dead button, it doesn't initiate moving forward, so you are dead in the water. The spacing/design is not suited well for some phones and the experience is chaotic and unorganized. Can' use this app, so can't save money on the go. Makes me think before choosing the new DG that just opened up in our town.
data.replyText: We're sorry for this experience, Anne. We're hoping to resolve this as soon as possible. To troubleshoot, please log into the website to accept the T&C. Then return to the DG App. We hope this helps. Thank you for your patience! -Autumn

data.text: The app is fine for maybe saving your digital coupons and finding the eligible items but that's it! Don't try to actually place an order for pickup ð. Or maybe it's just the location near me. They don't even attempt to fullfil pickup orders, they just cancel them. And when they do fulfill it, it's so lackadaisical and they are so quick to mark things out of stock which will kick out your coupons. Let's be honest shopping at the dollar general is often not worth it unless I'm using coupons.

Use it frequently, but one major frustration that I think would be an easy fix. Once I have added a coupon, and I can not remove it. Sometimes there are two different coupons for the same product, and I want to be able to use the coupon that gives me the biggest discount first. When ringing up transaction at store, system automatically applies the coupon that offers the least discount. If I could remove a coupon and then add it back later, that would fix the issue.

I downloaded this app so I could use the curbside pickup. Everything loads fine, and I was able to fill my cart, decide on substitution preferences, and click the Proceed to Checkout button. Nothing happens. It just clocks, and then gives me an error message, stating that I have no internet connection, and I would have to try again later. All of the other stuff with internet or data runs fine. My internet connection is fine. I still can't get the checkout screen to come up.
data.replyText: Hello Margaret. That's not what we like to hear. Can you send us an email at dgpickupsupport@dollargeneral.com? We want to look into this as quickly as possible. -Autumn

data.text: For a long time, I loved this app. Lately, however, I have been experiencing issues with coupons not working and the price scanner being inaccurate. It has always helped me save money and stay on budget. Now, the prices have even scanned more than the original dollar general stickers...sometimes less than marked, but then I have to pay more at the register. Super upsetting.

I wish I could give it zero stars. This app is horrible. Just last week, I went to Dollar General, and to my surprise, only one coupon applied out of 5 coupons. I politely declined the purchase because I'm not paying full price for items that also have digital coupons. Something is wrong with my cart when I add items just to get a estimate of how much the cost would be for example a 5 off 25 purchase I have to add at least 30 to 40 dollars just so the 5 off 25 applies! This is ludicrous!!

Could NEVER get this app to work right. Rarely loads, and when it does, I get constant errors resulting in app shut down. Can't change stores without crashing the app. The coupon filter doesn't work right. My clipped coupons won't load - my wallet shows the number I've clipped but says I haven't clipped any if I go to look at them. I'm sure there's more, but as I was never really able to USE the app, that's all I can share. I guess I won't be shopping at Dollar General and I'm disappointed.

I always expect this app to malfunction. And it hardly lets me down. I have uninstalled and reinstalled. And it doesn't open. It gets stuck on the ad without opening it. It gets stuck on the coupons without opening. I have tried wifi and cell data connections. Same results. It has been this way through 4 devices. So it isn't this phone. If it gets fixed, I probably will be shopping more at Dollar General. I can't wait. Please fix it.

I absolutely love being able to use the dollar general app to price check items instead of having to bug an associate to do it. I would like to have the option of unclipping a particular coupon. There is often multiple coupons for the same item but with different amounts off. They could of became available at different times, so I clipped both. And there's times when the coupon with the lower dollar amount will come off. When I preferred to use the coupon with the higher dollar amount.

I love the DG app, until this weekend. Since yesterday. I have not been able to scan items, clip new coupons, or get it to load correctly. Before this weekend i love how I was able to make my list and see what offers were available for the items that i need/wanted. I tried Uninstalling and reinstalling on my phone and a different phone. Restarting my phone and nothing has worked. Hopefully it's just a bug that can be fixed because then I would totally give it 5 stars!

I love DG and the app hasn't caused me any problems. I think it would be nice to have a way to transfer from list to cart or cart to list. More than one item at a time as well. Otherwise, I like the app! The only problem I have, and it may not even be the apps fault, idk But app says I've only saved $1 so far. That's impossible and the savings does not match receipts. I clip n go at least 3x Wk

While this app has always been pretty slow, it still served a purpose. I liked being able to save digital coupons & schedule pickups. However, over the past few months, digital coupons have seized to work. I can save them, but it never works upon checkout when entering my registered phone number in the terminal. I get zero deals. This happens at all five DG stores within a 40 mile radius. What's the point of having an app with digital coupons if it doesn't work? At least give us a paper backup.
data.replyText: Hello Jamie, thank you for sharing your experience. We're very sorry that you are unhappy with the App and we want to look into this. The best way to help troubleshoot your issue is by contacting us at DGDCP@dollargeneral.com or at 888-518-3446. We'll work to get this fixed for you as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience. -Autumn

data.text: The app has been updated and I really like it. I can add items to a list and it keeps a running total. I use the $5 off coupons when they're available, and I can see whether I have the $25 purchase amount required. It also applies that coupon and any others I've clipped. As I put each item in the cart, I can check it off my list. Then I can transfer the list to the cart. There are many other features like pay in-app and create a pickup order.

Shopping and using coupons is a breeze, but if an issue happens in store when you pick up your order you lose the coupons that you've selected. There is no option on the app to cancel an order after it has been picked at the store level, so the first time I used the app it resulted in a half hour ordeal in store trying to get the issue sorted out and even then it still wasn't resolved to make everything come out as it should have. The app makes things easy as long as the store is truly stocked.

Meh... I'm a bit disappointed that I can't actually select my local store. Even with location services on, it doesn't show any of the DGs in my town (and there are a few). The closest one on the app's map for some reason is over an hour & a half away, but there's literally one just one minute from where I live. While the app still technically works when I select that store (I can still make a shopping list and what not), it's still not optimal. DG needs to fix that glitch.

This app is garbage!!! It's always giving errors. It tells you to retry and still doesn't work. If you're lucky enough to get past the spinning and try to clip coupons, it still spins and does not add the coupons. I've uninstalled and reinstalled just to have the same issues. Either fix the app or throw it away! I'm being generous with one star, and that's only because you have to rate it.

UPDATE : 4/24/2022. I love dg digital coupons. When I first started using the app it would lag consistently. I could never connect to Dg wifi. Now it's doing much better. It still gets my prices wrong on some things, like it's a glitch in the system that shows prices wrong or sometimes it will just show $0.00 and when I go to pay for it, it shows the actual price. Other than that ,it's essentially a great app , and a must have this day in time.

Great bc you can verify prices (if you have correct store location set) & pay in app. However, it has serious issues. If you sign in on a new phone, tablet, laptop,ect, says password is incorrect or makes you change password EVERY SINGLE TIME! It is slow, & store wifi/bluetooth service is lacking to say the least, but you're forced to use it. The coupons dont all show up in coupon tab. Graphics are cartoony & preschool. "Chat" option is bogus. I could continue.
data.replyText: Hello Jerri - Thank you so much for your feedback! We're sorry you're unhappy with the app, but we really appreciate your input. We'll pass this along to the team and see what we can do to get this improved for you. -Autumn

data.text: I hate the update on the app. Because you could click it and it was added to your account. Know you have to add to your wallet. Many of the elderly dont remember to add it the wallet. So they think they have added it but in reality they just clicked it but didnt remember to add it. So when they put there account to get the coupons its not in there account. There frustrated because the coupon didn't come off thinking they were saving money and they feel like it was just a waste of time.

Downloaded app so that I get the advertised price of items in the store. I used the app to "download" a digital coupon. Used my account at checkout; noticed on receipt that it didn't take the coupon off. Tried a second time to buy something with a digital coupon, didn't work again. This time I said something to the cashier, who couldn't even override the price to take off the coupon amount. So I will be uninstalling. Also won't be going back to Dollar General due to this deceptive advertising.

The couponing I started doind4rg was because of downloading this app. I had broken my foot in two places and tore ligaments. I needed a way to save money, and I surely found it. almost all the things I buy are either on sale or I have a manufactured coupon. if I have both then they will stack!! The app let's you scan things to see the price, make grocery lists, see the coupons they offer, and make orders that you can pick up at a scheduled time and date you want. I cannot imagine not having this

It could really use some filters in the list. IE....Price small to high, alphabetical, department... I also find a lot of items show zero price once it's added to the list. The app also says out of stock on items that are being scanned directly in the store so perhaps it needs to be updated with what's in stock in the stores. It would be great to be able to save a list of favorite stores so it's easy to see where I want to go.
data.replyText: Hello Connie, thank you so much for your feedback! We really appreciate your input - we love hearing from our customers because it helps us improve your shopping experience. We will send your idea to the team and if we're not already working on it, we'll see if we can get it started! -Autumn

data.text: Can't get it to load coupons which is the only reason I downloaded it. Tried uninstalling and installing several times. Very worthless in my opinion. Update on review: I waited almost a year and just tried installing it again . It still won't load the coupons which is the only reason I want it. Still says there is an error loading rewards and try again later. I have a fairly new phone (Samsung S10) so I know it can't be the phone. Why can't you get this fixed so it's usable?!

The last update removed the ability to add items to your shopping list from flyer. You tap on the item and it shows details, but doesn't have an add to list button. The only way to add to list is by scanning barcode IN THE STORE. Nor, can you search for item and add to list. PLEASE bring back the ability to add from flyer or search, so you can shop flyer at home before you go to store. For this reason, I can only give 3 stars.

A great coupon app - if you can get it to open. I can't get past the Privacy and TOS acknowledgement page. The checkbook is grayed out. I reinstalled with no effect. Disappointing! Edit - I installed it again based on the developer's comment, and had the exact same issue. I can access it with no problems on the website, so it's not an account issue.
data.replyText: Amelia - we're so sorry about this. Our team identified an issue earlier this week that was preventing users from completing their account setup but this issue has been resolved. Please try again and let us know if you have any trouble: DGDCP@dollargeneral.com or 888-518-3446.

data.text: I haven't had many issues using the app and any issues that have come up are quickly fixed. I love clipping the coupons and saving money, I just wish the stores I go to would let me insert my phone number in order to actually use the coupons. Also wish you could do pick up with fresh, frozen, and dairy items. Everything in the store should be able to do pick up. Only complaint.

I honestly started off with 5 stars but the last few months I've had so many issues getting many of the tabs on the app (coupons more often then not) not loading. I've already reached out to customer support and was told to uninstall then reinstall the app. That works for a time but then starts messing up again in a few weeks. If it was not for the fact it does work after a reinstall for a time, I'd completly stop using it. Sometimes the official web page is more reliable.

Basically useless. The search feature never brings up the logical item. I'll type in "dress" and ranch dressing comes up first. Most of the time it will just say "0 results" when I know for a fact that it is in store and in stock. The product availability is yet to be accurate. A lot of the items don't have pictures uploaded and the ones that do have pictures are so small that you can't really see what you need to. The only thing that is somewhat decent is the coupon section and weekly ads.

I enjoy the ease of clipping coupons without having to use scissors. and ordering through the app is pretty easy. what 8s frustrating is that it will say in the app something is available then when my order is prepared it is all of a sudden no longer available, usually on a really good deal item. I have went into the store to pick up my order and browsed around and seen a supposed out of stock item on the shelf. wish inventory was more easily updated through app.

Everyone likes to save, but I hate when I go into the store and try to open the app then suddenly I can't. Sometimes there is something that I would like to add to my saved coupons. The registar NEVER asks you to put your phone number in. He/she will ring everything up quickly as I'm trying to enter my number. Very annoying! Better customer service is what I would like to see.

I like the app and the saving associated with the digital coupons. It would be great if you could unclip a digital coupon, but I have figured out a way to use a higher value coupon vs a lower value coupon by Simply having the cashier void the item and then rescan it after you have imputed your phone number, it will cause the higher value coupon to attach. My only issue with the app, was due to the recent update, the receipts that I have sent to me via email is now blank, no transaction history
data.replyText: Hello Andenisia, thank you for your kind feedback. If you'd like us to look into this further please send us an email at DGDCP@dollargeneral.com or give us a call at 888-518-3446 for further assistance. We'd like to look into this as quickly as possible. -Autumn

data.text: I LOVE that we can now scan the products in store for current pricing at that location! I HATE that the inventory is NEVER correct on it! It's a pretty new app that needs some things twerked or fixed, like the digital coupons actually showing attached to the correct item, the same as the register. But they are making improvements to it all the time, which I greatly appreciate! NOW IF DG COULD GET THEIR CUSTOMER INTERNET TO WORK AT ALL THE LOCATIONS, WE ACTUALLY COULD USE IT INSIDE THE STORE!!!
data.replyText: Hello Carla. Thank you so much for your feedback! We really appreciate your input - we love hearing from our customers because it helps us improve your shopping experience. We will send your idea to the team and if we're not already working on it, we'll see if we can get it started! -Autumn

data.text: I have been using this app for awhile and had NO problems except a few after they do updates. Recently they did an update and now I am unable to use my digital coupons. After I do all my shopping and get it rang up and I have done my part with putting my phone number in and the clerk get my total only for it to say they were declined. It is not just mine, I had my husband stop at dollar general to get some things and his did the same thing. This has been for 2 weeks or so. I have logged out and back in, I have Uninstalled it and reinstalled oh and it asked me to update again. Still the same thing. The clerks have no idea about the Digital Coupons and they have no idea who to contact. I have in the past tried to contact them over my digital app months ago and it was for managers. I have no idea what else to do, but shop somewhere else. I use to love it and used it several times a week. Hope they fix it soon.

I am using a review to reach out because the only other response I can get is an automated email about coupons and logging in, neither of which apply to me. This app is SO FRUSTRATING for Android! I like to be able to scan items in store because the scanned price and shelf price often don't match. However I am completely unable to change the store location to get a correct price. This is a huge problem because I visit over 5 stores in my area and prices vary widely! I am able to search for a store and select a store. It brings up a screen where I can get directions and it shows me hours. However at the bottom of that screen where iPhone users see "make this my preferred store" my screen cuts off and I cannot scroll down and click on that selection. This is a really critical updated that needs fixed ASAP or you need to help me out with a solution for this. I have the latest app update (I uninstalled and reinstalled) and I have restarted my phone. Please help.
data.replyText: Hi Patricia - thanks so much for reaching out and we're so sorry to hear about these issues. Please send an email to dggofeedback@digital.dollargeneral.com and we'll help get this resolved for you ASAP.

data.text: App is basically unusable right now. Just like everyone else is reporting.... Constantly getting unable to connect or "Error processing your request. Please try again later." Tried over both mobile data and WiFi, clearly it is a server side issue. Please fix your stuff. Thankfully for me the worker was really nice and was still able to apply the discount I was trying to use but wouldn't load.

So. Many. Glitches. Sits at a "processing" screen for a long time every step of the way. I've tried to sign up and after much processing, an error that kills the process. Closed the app and went back in to see if I could log in, tells me the account is locked, try again in 20 minutes. Never used such a slow and glitchy app, it's awful.

$5 off coupons keep disappearing and then sometimes reappearing. The $5 off coupons are not being deducted from totals and now they are harder to find. Also, sometimes the full amount of the coupon does not come off. I have been cheated out of discounts a couple of times now. Called customer service and was told to keep an eye out for an email & I am still waiting on it. So basically they have been no help so far. Uninstalled & reinstalled with same problem. I love DG but VERY frustrated!

This app used to work great. Lately, however, it will not calculate the 3 for $$$ deals on soft drink deals. It lowers the price when you add a second one and then nearly doubles the price when you add a third one. It says, "Better deal found". RIGHT...You can add 4, 5, and 6 and it will give lower price for those but not the first three. DG needs to figure this out and fix. Also, still cannot add a second payment method in the app.
